item.description: enable RBAC kube-apiserver - --authorization-mode=RBAC User CRUD openssl genrsa -out bigo.key 2048 openssl req -new -key bigo.key -out bigo.csr -subj "/CN=wubigo/O=bigo LLC" sudo openssl x509 -req -in bigo.csr -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key -CAcreateserial -out bigo.crt -days 500 kubectl config set-credentials bigo --client-certificate=./bigo.crt --client-key=./bigo.key kubectl config set-context bigo-context --cluster=kubernetes --namespace=bigo-NS --user=bigo kubectl config get-contexts ...
